invalid-input_key2: Aapko yeh check karna hai ki user no jo `input` daala hai, woh valid hai ya nahi. Iske liye aapko yeh dekhna hai ki jo user ne `input` daala hai,
invalid-input_key3: usmei agar ek se jyada `letters` hai toh, woh `input` invalid hai
invalid-input_key4:
usmei a to z ke alawa koi bhi `character` hai toh woh `input` invalid hai
  - Yeh check karne ke liye aap .isalpha function use kar sakte ho
invalid-input_key6: Aapko user se `input` receive karne ke baad check karna hai ki `input` valid hai ya nahi
invalid-input_key7: Check karne ke liye aap user ke `input` ki length check kar sakte hai
invalid-input_key8: Agar `input` valid hai toh sab accha hai
invalid-input_key9: Par agar `input` invalid hai toh aap `loop` ko wapis se continue karo aur dobara user `input` lo
